name: fer.al
description:
What Is Fer.Al?
Fantastic species from both myth and fable have gathered together on the world of Fer.al.

These creatures hail from vastly different worlds, and have never existed in the same place and time. Bringing with them their own creativity and style, their coexistence has drawn the attention of many.

The universe is beginning to take notice, the creatures are evolving, and the world is ever changing. Share your creations and become Fer.al, as you explore this strange and off-beat universe.
